incidents.name: Contentstack Launch - AWS NA - Intermittent 503 response on Hosted websites

incident_updates.body: Jul 27, 2024 - 11:27 UTC to 11:32 UTC Informational—We experienced intermittent 503 gateway errors on launch-hosted sites. This event is resolved, and there is no remaining impact. All other services remain unaffected. If you have any questions and/or concerns, please engage with our support team through https://www.contentstack.com/customers/support/ or email us at support@contentstack.com.

incident_updates.body: We have observed intermittent (or frequent) network call failure with our cloud provider (Azure), which may cause users to experience network connection issues such as network slowness and/or timeouts. We are monitoring the situation and will share an update when more information is available.

incidents.name: Contentstack - AWS US and EU Production - Content Delivery Service Disruption

incident_updates.body: Contentstack experienced Content Delivery Service Disruption on 19th January, 2023 at 23:00 UTC - 23:06 UTC. The disruption was caused due to failures at Contentstack CDN Provider. The Content Delivery services were recovered quickly, and Contentstack continues to monitor the same.

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing a bulk publishing delay and users may not see their content changes published immediately. Single publishing and unpublishing are working as expected. Our team is actively working towards resolving the delay. We will keep you posted with further updates.
